translations: 波维尔（沙俄贵族阶层成员，地位仅次于王公，后被彼得大帝废除）

sentences.sentence: "Some other steps to consider include renegotiating your lease with your landlord, negotiating better pricing with vendors and suppliers, and reconsidering your own pricing structure," Mr. Boyar says.
sentences.translation: “其他的一些步骤包括和您的房东重新商谈租赁价格，和供应商以及卖主商议更好的价格，还有重新考虑您的价格体系。”Boyar先生谈到。
